post: BTW, contrary to a die-hard received idea, most it not all these relics were not destroyed at the French Revolution. They were simply buried and lost as the two individuals who buried them died before  Le Concordat. The said relics STILL can be unearthed (hope they were buried in lead & brass receptacle(s) though). Anyone interested by funding an expedition (‘Quest for the Missing Sainte-Chapelle relics’) welcome.
